title: Sudden infant death syndrome with mention of autopsy
chapter: Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified
block: Ill-defined and unknown causes of mortality
inclusion: sudden (unexplained) (infant) death (syndrome) under one year of age
exclusion: abnormal findings on antenatal screening of mother
certain conditions originating in the perinatal period
sudden (unexplained) (infant) death (syndrome) age one year and over
